.class public auto ansi sealed DialogProc extends System.MulticastDelegate

public delegate bool DialogProc(IntPtr hwndDlg, int uMsg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam);
type DialogProc = delegate of nativeint * int * nativeint * nativeint -> bool

span.span: A handle to the dialog box.

summary.span: 處理傳送至強制回應 (Modal) 或非強制回應 (Modeless) 對話方塊之訊息。

span.span: Processes messages that are sent to a modal or modeless dialog box.

returns.span: 若 DialogProc 成功處理訊息，則為 否則為 。

span.span: if the DialogProc successfully processed the message; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用 DialogProc 函式和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 進行程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the DialogProc function and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
